links.title: Google reportedly paying Apple $9 billion to remain default search engine in Safari on iOS
links.description: As it's been learned over the years, Google pays Apple to remain the default search engine in Safari on iOS. While neither company publicly speaks on the agreement, analysts believe payments are made in the billions.

messages.body: $AAPL have the XS Max. Best phone I’ve ever owned. Smooth and you’ll never miss the home button.
Appeals court reverses 2015 patent-infringement verdict won by UofWis-Madison - microchip tech in iPhone & iPad. Would have cost $AAPL $506M
In all, 100+ legal proceedings around the world b/n $AAPL & $QCOM, including patent challenges at USPTO & lawsuits in China & Germany.
ITC rules $AAPL iPhone models infringe on 1 of 3  $QCOM patents but  declines QCOM’s request to ban import of infringing iPhones into US

messages.body: $TSLA Lower high formation and dived 40$ vs $AAPL higher low  more formation, $STUDY trend vs reversals https://www.stockoptionstutorials.com/retracements-or-reversals/

links.title: Retracements or reversals
links.description: Retracement or Reversal: It is important to know that traders usually trade according to technical analysis in order to profit from short-term price moves instead of waiting to profit from long-term price movements. Retracements and Reversals levels are very important factors in the technical analysis and without this knowledge, you risk exiting too soon and missing opportunities.

messages.body: $AAPL how Dark do you dare? https://sixcolors.com/post/2018/09/hazeover-makes-dark-mode-that-much-darker/

links.title: HazeOver makes Dark Mode that much darker
links.description: The biggest problem with Dark Mode in macOS Mojave is that not every app has gotten the message. Some apps-especially ones that display web content-are going to be unflaggingly black-on-white, and it's glaring and awful in Dark Mode. There are a few workarounds.
